Would have liked to try out the beauty salon but didn't have much time. Great service, friendly staff, great value - will definitely go back!!

Reviews.Title: “awesome stay”
Reviews.Author: KateT2571
Reviews.Content: This is my favorite place in OC to stay....this is my 3rd time here at this hotel and i wont go any place else.......

Reviews.Title: “This hotel was great”
Reviews.Author: xrsize4
Reviews.Content: I really enjoyed my stay here. The rooms were very spacious and clean. The only bit of trouble was in the parking garage - just a bit to narrow for me. Everything else was excellent!!! Look forward to staying again.

Reviews.Title: “The best customer service I have ever found!”
Reviews.Author: kwaters11
Reviews.Content: The princess Royale accommodated us above our highest expectations. Everyone that works there is very helpful, friendly and respectful. The rooms are very clean and the indoor pool is wonderful for kids on a rainy day. They have a restaurant, convenience store and much more to offer. I will never stay anywhere else!

Reviews.Title: “Facility very adequate.”
Reviews.Author: flapsupht
Reviews.Content: Hotel is aging and needs revitalization in the rooms and public areas.

Reviews.Title: “Would be fabulous if only re-furbished”
Reviews.Author: Canajun57
Reviews.Content: My husband and I just spent 4 nights at the Princes Royale, Sept. 8 - 12. Despite bad weather - we could still spend time on the beach, albeit in the wind - watching the Nor'easter with dark skies and huge waves. Having our oceanfront room is the only way to make the best of a rainy/cloudy/windy week - as we'd open our curtains and voila - the Atlantic, with balcony and that's worth everything to us. After Labor the Day this room was affordable. We had read that the hotel had been refurnished for 2009. Yes - the beds are now Tempur-pedic and very very comfortable. We had a flat screen TV on the wall and another in the living area. As for any other remodeling - there's granite everywhere - on the kitchen and bathroom countertops - on the kitchen table, coffee table, end tables, bureaus... The hotel must have gotten a good deal on the granite to add so much - but their money could have been better spent if the hotel would only replace the sleep sofa and loveseat as the upholstered fabric is old and the seats sink a bit and you know how many people have sat on these over the years! The small upholstered chair in the bedroom area could be recovered or replaced. The carpets are old and should be replaced. The partial kitchen we had was great - with a full fridge. Most guests I think will only use this kitchen for breakfast and lunch and so it would have been nice to have a toaster in the kitchen!! - There is only a microwave and 2 burner stove top... so don't expect to cook a meal - but pasta could work! Our bathtub had a lot of mold around the edges and along the wall tiles. There's no excuse for this - as maintenance staff should be on top of it and recalk, as it's a sure turnoff! Our dishwasher leaked - and I was told it was a matter of water pressure and was ok!! - duh - there's water pressure when running a dishwasher - so it really should NOT leak onto the kitchen floor. I am not sure I should mention the many ants we found crawling into the bedroom directly from the sliding doors at the balcony. We were on the 5th floor. We called the front desk and they said they'd sent someone.... A maintenance man (very nice man) came and said the maid service would spray for ants! That in our opinion wasn't going to fix the problem! As for the hotel itself - It has a lot to offer... and since the weather was so cold, winday, rainy, it was nice to relax in front of the 4 story glass window and watch the waves and the palm trees blowing in the wind.... We did not use the pool.... way too many es - video game machines... and also a convenient kiosk that makes drinks and serves pretzels. Another one outside - but seemed closed after Labor Day. We did not partake of the hotel restaurant. The fitness center was small and my husband used it - but said the equipment was somewhat less than ideal... Yes - the hotel did smell a lot from some sort of deoderizer - which didn't bother me but my husband felt that it only means the hotel must have other smells, maybe mold, that it is covering up. The staff was not very friendly at check-in... though maybe they were stressed?? However, whenever we'd ask for something - they were very kind on the phone and took care of our needs... extra towels, ant spray!! maintenance man for dishwasher. Overall - it's a convenient location - and wonderful to have oceanfront room - but the hotel is in much need of an overhaul...The beachfront is very deep and there's a nice deck outside of the indoor pool, with seating, plus 2 hot tubs. Also - the parking lot is tight. It's a covered lot - but the hotel should consider building a covered walkway from parking area to front entrance as in the case of rain - there's no shelter, even though it's a short distance. Would we stay here again? I would love to - but only if it undergoes a true renovation. Free wifi was great - and we did not have any problems getting onto the internet.

Reviews.Title: “Good concept, badly executed...”
Reviews.Author: unctarheel23
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel with friends hoping to use the kitchen facilities. While there was a clean sink, cooktop, fridge and microwave, plan to bring your own utensils and any other small kitchen appliances you might need (ie, toaster). The decor throughout most of the hotel has not been updated since it was built, though the bedrooms have been recently furnished and do have a "flat screened" TV. The worst part of the hotel was that our room was on the same level as the arcade and pool tables, and people did not obey the closing time so it was extremely loud. Request a room that does NOT face the indoor pool area. This hotel would be good during the middle of the summer if you have children as it is right on the beach and has a pool but it does not offer much value for its off-season prices.

Reviews.Title: “The Pricess Royale was fantastic”
Reviews.Author: MarylandSully
Reviews.Content: Our family of six (grandparents, parents and two young children) had a wonderful stay at the Princess Royale. We were able to rent a lovely, spacious, recently renovated two bedroom/ two bathroom condominium for four nights. All of the staff of the Princess Royale was professional and courteous. Diane Anderson, the condominium manager, was very helpful when making the reservation and following through to ensure everything turned out right. Every staff person we encountered (in the restaurant, cleaning our unit, etc.) was always pleasant and helpful. There are also several good restaurants within a block of the hotel. And the grocery store is only two block away. All three generation had a great time and will definitely go back.

Reviews.Title: “Princess Royale is a great vacation spot for all.”
Reviews.Author: Bejeweled72
Reviews.Content: The 3 bedroom condos are great. Plenty of room for a party of 6. The hotel has happy hour every day. I really like the beach bar with entertainment daily. Schooner's has good food. The only issue is having to use two different elevators to get to the condos.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place!”
Reviews.Author: PATraverler
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a visit to Ocean City, MD and stayed at the Princess Royale. What a great hotel!. The staff was friendly. The valet service was fast. The accomodations were wonderful. We stayed in the economy suite and was plesantly surprised at how nice it was. The room was spacious and there was a flat screen tv in the bedroom, really great tempurpedic mattress, full kitchen, living area with sofa, chair, tables and another tv. There was also a small dinette set. Our stay there was a wonderful experience. I look forward to visiting again.

Reviews.Title: “Princess of Ocean City”
Reviews.Author: gene6362
Reviews.Content: Good location for a family, close to the boardwalk but not too close. Near good resturants. Great beach and pool.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect place for family vacation!”
Reviews.Author: susan6770
Reviews.Content: I rented a two bedroom condo for my family, 2 adults, a 12 year old and a 18 month old. The place was so large is was terrific. The unit was well-equipped and the washer and dryer were a wonderful surprise. We were comfortable, close to the beach, able to live like we at home, but on vacation!!! Having a toddler can make travelling a little difficult, but this was really a perfect place to be ... the ocean and beach were clean, lifeguards were terrific and I had an umbrella waiting for me every monring. The boardwalk is not within walking distance, but we never had trouble finding a spot to park. We are looking forward to coming back!!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay in OC with tons to offer couples, families, or friends.”
Reviews.Author: cruisedirector32
Reviews.Content: This was our 2nd stay at the Princess Royale this year and we're planning another long weekend before the end of the year. The kids are happy, the grown ups are happy because everything is right there on premisis. Works great for just your family, couple, or if you have friends or extended family vacationing at the same time. The atrium area is beautiful and the hotel is well kept. Don't worry about pool noise when you're in a pool view room - we heard little if any noise. Definately recommend it staying here.

Reviews.Title: “Princess Royale was all we hoped for”
Reviews.Author: emptynestersagain
Reviews.Content: I booked our room directly from the hotel after checking it out on TripAdvisor.com and they honored our request for a high oceanview room close to the beach (our room was on the 4th floor 3 rooms back from the front of the hotel with a beautiful ocean view.) We took advantage of the valet parking and left our car parked for the 4 days we were there. A bellhop carted our stuff up to our room and back down again when we checked out. We walked to restaurants or used the bus which picks up right in front of the hotel for a $2 per person charge per day. The hotel is located in a quiet part of town which was perfect for us (in our 50's) and the spacious beach protected by lifeguards. The beds were very comfortable and the living room, bath, and kitchenette were spacious and cozy. For only a little more money we found this hotel to be a big improvement over the condos we've stayed in at Wildwood Crest, NJ, the last 3 beach vacations. Although we didn't use most of the amenities of the hotel (pool, restaurants, games, entertainment) it was nice that they were there for those who wanted them. Once we got to our room it was totally quiet. (One thing you should know, though, is toasters are not allowed due to being a "fire hazard") We bought groceries from the grocery store kitty corner across the road. We ate at the Bull on the Beach sports grill (great crab dip) one block up on Sat. night and had to wait 40 mins. for a table - a clue it's got good food. Also ate at Island Cafe (best crab soup and crab cakes), Nick's Original House of Ribs (the ribs were excellent), Liquid Assets (across the street -- a restaurant within a wine store -- very unique and delicious and like others enjoyed the cheese board), and Bayside Skillet for crepes (huge and delicious with plenty of fresh fruit!) We will definitely return to the Princess Royale.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly Surprised !”
Reviews.Author: carolinagirl057
Reviews.Content: We are very picky travelers and like to stay in four star hotels. We planned our trip late and I chose this hotel by reviewing things I had read on trip advisior and other sites. We are new to Maryland and really did not know where to stay so we took a chance. We had a terrific stay. The hotel room was clean, modern and the staff was amazing. They accomodated us any way they could. The Schooner Restauant for drinks in the evening was wonderful as well. The bartender was friendly and made you want to come back.

Reviews.Title: “The hotel fits my style and taste”
Reviews.Author: mscurrency
Reviews.Content: I like the service of valet parking and the luggage carriers. The cleaning service was quick and efficient. However, I don't like that I have to reuse towels. For a hotel of this status, a clean towel should not be an issue. Other than that I definitely will be back. Love it!!!!

Reviews.Title: “First time in OC, MD and the Princess but we will be back to both!!”
Reviews.Author: Reddevilvs
Reviews.Content: Ok, we checked in 8/23 and checked out 8/28/09...we stayed in a inside/Pool/Oceanview Suite...Fourth floor..........Im gonna list Good/Bad Points below................ Good Points.......... Very Nice Hotel....I have done alot of Pleasure and Business travel for many years and this Hotel for my Purpose...Family vacation that's wasnt filled with crazy teens was great!! Room.... Once again Temperpidic Mattress was great...except now my wife wants one at Home..Thanks Princess! :( Kitchen with full Fridge was great..........Microwave is needed though ! Flat screen TV was great...maybe do a PPV option in the future? Tv in Living room area needs updating........Balcony was nice................ Valet Parking..Great Touch...I glady gave Valets my tip $$ as it made the trip feel "nice" ..car was ready in front in like 3 minutes each time,Prof. Staff ! Restaurant......Nice touch to offer 3 meals a day on Premise...plus the Outdoor bar and Lunch area is great touch....Menu should be expanded a little...maybe add kids menu and some crayons !! ROOM SERVICE was great...Price were very fair,service was accurate and fast...........very convient and a major plus !! Front Desk....Service was always freindly and quick...allthough sometimes language barrier was a pain.....I do understand the need to hire some Foreign exchange type staff..wasnt a big deal.......... We did receicve a Cot for free for 3 days due to some issues which I will explain below...But, Cots should be like $5-$10 a day, not $15..no need to make a profit really on the Cot when I spent over $1500 for a week........... Pool area...Atrium with seating area and video games..pool tables was Great !! View of pool and nice softer music was great....Nice Plants and decorations all over the Atrium....we had view of Ocean and Beach..awesome !!! Now, A few Bad Points............. Pool...Green Color was not good...I went in every day but my Wife didnt go on at all..she felt it was kinda nasty looking considering after 20 years of traveling we never encountered a Green Pool...There was no staff at the pool area that would understand Engish so we couldnt ask...should have asked at front desk I guess...I had at least 5 frends say Pool was Blue on Website but Green inur Pics ! Eww....Not good for Potential Vistors to the Princess..Bad First impression !!! Kids loved it...LOL!!!!!! Air Condition.......Bedroom was cool..not Cold! Living room area was kinda warm..not good !! We called for reapirmen 2 t seperate days ,who came up in less than 10 minutes which was great !!! Including once at like Midnight ! They basically adjusted the inner vents and one time said the Compressor had turened off....they admitted that the AC is never Super COld like many Hotels...........we agreed !! AC was non existant in Elevators and Hallways most of our trip !!!! Hot Tub........Inside and Outside were so heavily used it always seemed and looked dirty! Yes, it is a Hotel and used like 12 Hours a Day but maybe Chemicals/filter should be checked like every 3 hours during Peak summer months !! All the Hallways going towards the Rest. were outdated and even the LARGE Glass Chandelier had a 1980's look !! Wow ! A wrote alot !! Bottom line this long review shows my passion for this Hotel and I want to tell others to Go to the Princess Royal...Me and my family will go back....Hopefully to see a few changes made and Esp. to always see a Nice BLUE/Clear Pool................. Glen Ps...Diane Anderson....I read another review about the Town/City having water issues but there are still safe chemicals that can be put in overnight to cure this Green look.... :)

Reviews.Title: “Good for eating in”
Reviews.Author: runwildrunfree
Reviews.Content: Just stayed at the Princess. The hotel is a bit on the "worn" side, but not so bad that you wouldn't want to stay there. The one big plus is the large rooms and almost full kitchen, large fridge, microwave, cooktop and dishwasher. Also includes dishes, pot and pans. So if you like to have the option of eating in (say breakfast or lunch), this is very convenient. Hotel has a very large indoor pool which looked nice (didn't try it) and is located right on the beach. Hotel also has a nice beach deck with lounge chairs and plenty of free parking. Fitness center needs serious updating.

Reviews.Title: “fun vacation”
Reviews.Author: lsg1807
Reviews.Content: the room was very comfortable and spacious. beds were fabulous. we loved the pool which was a good size. also, the jacuzzi's overlooking the beach were really fun.

Reviews.Title: “Las Vegas on the Atlantic”
Reviews.Author: daisygirl59
Reviews.Content: I'm always interested when a hotel draws such passionate responses from reviewers. Maybe it's because it's a vacation spot, rather than business, and when you're spending your own money rather than the company's you're more particular. Whatever the case, I found the Princess Royale was hardly the dump described by some, but had some (minor) issues for our stay. On the pro side, the beach is RIGHT THERE, as described, and I am surprised that people have not noted what a wide, clean and non-rocky beach it is. We had no problem finding our way through the hotel to the outside. I don't know how you could be confused - the elevator has a sign that clearly states access is through the second floor. The decor is a little cheesy, as noted in other reviews, but my teen kids found it amusing and campy - the velvet chairs, the lighted mirrored ceilings, the pink wall trim, the patterned carpeting. Las Vegas on the Atlantic. I mean, what would you expect from a place called the Princess Royale? It's not going to be like Pottery Barn. The room was very clean, not a bug to be seen, which is an accomplishment at the beach. My kids loved the Tempurpedic beds; my husband was lukewarm but he's never happy with any bed. I liked the little ocean-view balcony outside. What I didn't like is that coffee is provided only for the first day of a stay, apparently, not the second, so I didn't have my morning coffee to drink out there after the first day. Sorry, but that kind of thing makes a difference to me. TVs were nice and I'm one to like granite surfaces on tables, etc., as it makes them easy to keep clean. The parking garage is kind of scary, with ramps at a high angle, but manageable. The toilet in our room made a lot of noise, and seemed to struggle somewhat, but not enough to call in management. Bathroom is nice and big. The indoor pool - well, gotta say it did appear kind of nasty. My daughter went in, and said it was too warm and the water indeed was cloudy. But we were there for the beach, not the pool, and the beach is great. All in all, it was fine for Ocean City, where it's a struggle to locate a decent hotel that's not $400 a night. It is not the Hilton and not a five-star hotel. Keep your expectations in check and you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “resort style vacation”
Reviews.Author: TINMAN28
Reviews.Content: Great place to take your family ,the pool is large,the beach is clean,music was great,food was tasty,staff was friendly and helpfull. My family and extanded family will be booking 6 rooms next Aug. CANT WAIT!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice and relaxing stay”
Reviews.Author: Ladym1
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed staying at Princess Royale. We liked our Ocean front room. The service was good.

Reviews.Title: “A family tradition of ocean, mini golf and time together!”
Reviews.Author: NHFamily4995
Reviews.Content: We have been staying at the Princess Royale Resort for the last 4 years...it has become a family tradition! We have visited for 2 years during April when all was quiet and had a wonderful family time playing on the beach and in the pool area. The other years were spent during the month of August spending most of our time in the ocean. The rooms are fine for a family of four...espically if the children are young. The kitchenette is a wonderful addition since we ate breakfast and lunch in. The staff is friendly and accomidating although we noticed this last visit that the service has gone down some. We most definetely will return!

Reviews.Title: “FAMILY FUN IN THE SUN”
Reviews.Author: shallak
Reviews.Content: Princess Royale is a fantastic hotel. People were polite and very helpful. We were going to stay at a hotel on the Boardwalk until I saw the PR website. I would have given this hotel a perfect score if it was not for the bathroom - it needed to be updated. We had an issue with the shower and there was no ventilation. I didn't report this to the staff - it might have been corrected.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Accomodations!”
Reviews.Author: skyleigh
Reviews.Content: The 2 bedroom ocean front condo was the bomb!!!! It was super clean and super nice! The tempur-pedic beds were awesome! It nicely accomodated our family of 6. It was a bit hard to communicate with some of the staff as they don't speak english very well. The housekeeping did a splendid job keeping the condo clean. The Bell service was ontop of their game. They were quick to get our things to our room and very courteous. The outdoor entertainment was awesome and the bartenders at the outdoor bar (Steve and Jake) were very kind, prompt, and helpful in guiding us to good restaurants and things to see and do. Getting to the beach from the hotel was very easy as well. The only thing we really didn't like about the Princess Royale was the inhouse restaurant. The food was overpriced and tasted terrible! Some, not all, of the front desk personal were a bit rude. Also, the elevators are a bit strange the way they are set up. However, overall, it was very nice. This was our 1st trip to Ocean City. We would definately stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great location on beach, comfortable rooms”
Reviews.Author: saigon1515
Reviews.Content: We loved our stay at the Princess Royal. We were right on the beach + they had an indoor pool which was open late. Clean, comfortable rooms. A game room next to / at the pool. The elevators were a little slow but other than that, we were very happy with our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place”
Reviews.Author: schooner427
Reviews.Content: The place wasnt bad, I could see if you got the bad room things could go down in a hurry, but our stay was good. I have been at nicer hotels. this one is by no means 5 star. i wouldnt recomend the buffet at the hotel, worst crabs ive ever eaten. the beds were comfy.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful visit once again to the best hotel in OC MD”
Reviews.Author: vlyak
Reviews.Content: We are repeat customers to this wonderful establishment, and this visit was no exception. From our very first visit, we were impressed with the spacious suites and the cleanliness of the rooms. The kitchen area is roomy with a full size refrigerator/ice maker, dishwasher, microwave and cook top stove. The livingroom area is also nice with a pull out sofa bed and second TV, which is great for the kids. We get the best sleep ever when we stay there, not only because of the sound of the ocean, but their top notch tempurpedic matresses. From check-in to check-out, the hotel Management and staff are extremely friendly, courteous and willing to help you with any request. Everyone goes out of their way to make your stay pleasant. The hotel has everything you could want for an enjoyable stay. To begin with, it is right on the ocean...only steps away from the water!! The huge indoor pool and atrium area is the best compared to any others we have looked at, with plenty of tables/chairs to relax, an inside hot tub and two addtional hot tubs out on the deck. This is a great place to be in the winter months, or if it is raining. Their oceanfront restaurant & lounge, Schooners, has great food and they offer different buffets on certain days. We always have their yummy breakfast buffet !! We love the location of Princess Royale because it is more relaxing than being at the boardwalk. You can hop on a bus for a very nominal daily fee to take you to the boardwalk if you don't want to drive. The hotel is close to other fine eateries as well, and you can walk across the street to a supermarket if you cannot find what you need in the hotel convenience store on the first floor. Although we come to Princess Royale at different times of the year, it is especially nice in the summer to relax by their gazebo bar on the lawn under the palm trees, and listen to live music daily. I honestly could go on and on with the ammenities, but you just have to visit here for yourself and see !! You will not be disappointed. We won't go anywhere else !!

Reviews.Title: “Satisfied overall”
Reviews.Author: SunSandLove
Reviews.Content: The hotel was very nice in comparison to other Ocean City hotels. Yes, some of it was run down, but that's common in OC. The All You Care to Eat Buffet was pretty pricey for its limited selection. The Schooners restaurant was nice for a quick lunch. We thought the water of in the indoor pool was too cold for us. My husband's biggest complaint about the resort was the lack of English speaking staff. He didn't feel they were helpful with directions or suggestions of places to go. I thought all the staff I encountered was very friendly. I would definately stay in the Princess Royale again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay at Princess Royale Once Again”
Reviews.Author: Tachiebluebird
Reviews.Content: Having stayed here once before, we became repeat guests on this trip, and can't wait for our third visit. We booked an oceanview king and had the good fortune to be right in the middle on an upper floor with a great view of the bay and the ocean. Our first trip we were second floor oceanfront which was amazing and overlooked the nicely manicured lawn and swaying palm trees. (We didn't use the indoor pool/restaurants) The room was clean and smelled fresh with the most comfortable king bed, flat screen, nice furniture, kitchenette, and front room with sofa bed and TV. (some complain this room is dark and drab, but it is a nice room--see photo!) The rooms are huge by hotel standards and the master bedroom is situated next to the balcony so you hear no sounds from the hallway at night. It was in fact very quiet at night for mid-August and was just as quiet when we first stayed there over Columbus Day weekend last year. Specific things we love about the PR: beach right at your door, tasteful live music in the afternoon on the patio which you could hear on the beach, well groomed lawns and beautiful palm trees, shower room after a day on the beach (after you've checked out), lobby decor is just classic, fun gift shop, in-hotel convenience store and their helpful and friendly staff, walkability to restaurants, and of course, the rooms with wonderful AC in hot humid August! (we didn't use the fitness center/restaurants/indoor pool.) Just a few things which could use improvement: first and foremost the front desk staff could use a lot of friendliness and customer service training, we could not get wireless in our room or anywhere in the hotel (not even in the atrium where the signal is supposedly strongest), and the elevators are a little on the slow side. But honestly, I didn't care !!! Our room was great and I was at the beach!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great trip”
Reviews.Author: sandhog
Reviews.Content: We just got home from a short get away to OC. The hotel is clean and the staff are very helpful.Good stretch of beach steps from the hotel,close enough to everything and far enough away to be quiet.I will not hesitate to book here again.

Reviews.Title: “OK Hotel with nice beachfront”
Reviews.Author: NonPickyVacationer
Reviews.Content: This was a our first vacation to Ocean City, Maryland. I picked this hotel because it was on the waterfront and had a full size refrigerator. The refrigerator and kitchen area was nice and full sized. The hotel was conveniently close to many great restaurants and of course the beach was great and it was away from the hustle and bustle of the downtown area. The service from the bellhops was good. Everyone else was just OK to indifferent. A lot of young looking youths worked the front desk and pool areas. There is a warning that if the room smelled like cigarette smoke after your stay that you would be charged $200.00. The only problem with this is that the hallways and rooms seem to already have the stench of cigarette smoke from many years past, probably from a time when smoking was still allowed. My unworn clothes have the smell of cigarettes when I came back home. I DO NOT blame the hotel in this regard. People smoke. What can we do. The carpeting in the hallways looks worn out but the furniture inside was new looking and the matresses are top notch tempurpedic. All in all, it was a comfortable stay, but some may find the clash of new and old and cheesy a bit hard to swallow. Although the staff would probably have been helpful If I had called them, an extra roll of toilet paper would have been nice to see in the bathroom.

Reviews.Title: “great hotel”
Reviews.Author: jeepode
Reviews.Content: The hotel was more then we expected for the price. There low cost rooms that do not have balconies are just as nice as the ones that do. It still has sliding glass doors that open you just can't sit outside. Our room was clean and very large. You have a living room, kitchen, bath and bedroom. The livingroom has a sofabed (double size) and tv. The kitchen has a dishwasher, fullsize refrigerator with ice maker, range top, microwave, and includes dishes. pans and sliverware. The indoor pool is great for the rainy days and the walk to the beach was very short. This is a great hotel anytime of the year!

Reviews.Title: “Spectacular , most Friendly, relaxing, beautiful Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Areinoehl67
Reviews.Content: I planned a trip to Ocean City with my Two children who are in the Military. In which my son only had 2 weeks till he deployed to Iraq. He wanted to go to a place where we could spend some family time before he left. I was so glad we picked this place. The people were absolutely friendly, very informative on things to do & see. Our room was very very clean, and always had extra towles when we asked. The resturant was a little expensive , but..when it comes to my children somehow all I wanted was the best, And they have it..! The only thing they could use there to make the place 100% complete is a "Lazy River". We loved the beach being right only a step away, and the cabanas were fantastic. My only complaint is our vacation ended too soon! Would have loved to stay another week!

Reviews.Title: “Nice rooms but uncaring management”
Reviews.Author: WorldTraveler005
Reviews.Content: The first thing we noticed about the hotel is that you can't get a luggage cart w/o using a bell hop. They won't give you anything for nothing here. They don't include breakfast, a newspaper, local calls, or a room safe w/o extra charge. The hotel is so much in demand that customer service isn't emphasized either. Don't be late to claim your room, b/c those who show up first will get the best rooms. They claim that they honor specific requests, but they don't. We booked 2 oceanfront rooms, requesting one on a high floor and a quiet room on any floor. We showed up 1 hour after rooms became available, and got 2 oceanfront rooms, but 1 on the first floor and 1 on the 2nd over the restaurant, so not quiet and neither on a high floor. The management said the hotel was booked so too bad. They were very put out when we requested 2 room changes the next day but said they would change our rooms. They acted like they were doing us a favor. The first floor has a very strange layout so I would avoid booking that floor. The a/c wasn't working in the first floor hallway either. The convenience store never seemed to be open when we needed it. We couldn't find water or soda in the vending machines on any floor. We wanted to take some bottles to the beach on such a hot day. The desk clerk told us to go to the convenience store, but it was closed, of course. Our 2nd floor room smelled strongly of smoke even tho the hotel claims it's smoke free. They offered to use an ionizer to clear the room. Maintenance was very responsive in general. Overall, the oceanfront rooms are pleasant, indoor pool is nice, but the management is indifferent.

Reviews.Title: “We enjoyed our stay and keep coming back”
Reviews.Author: chickieNy
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the Princess many times over and have never been disappointed. The staff are great and go above and beyond, the rooms are clean with many amenites. After a day at the beach it is great to sit by the pool while the kids swim. Great value for the dollar.

Reviews.Title: “HOTEL IS NICE, FRIENLY, BUT THE BUFFET NOT WORTH THE MONEY”
Reviews.Author: frosty1220
Reviews.Content: We stayed for four days and were very happy with the service, room and all areas were very clean. Appliances are somewhat outdated and patio door hard to open. Our only real disappointment was the buffet - prime rib was red, food lacked taste , for the money better off going out to eat somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: “Great!”
Reviews.Author: Praiser1
Reviews.Content: The hotel accomodations(dining, swimming pool area, service was wonderful) Only 1 issue, it was four of us staying and service only gave us 2 washclothes, towels and hand towels, so I had to continously ask for more towels. I think that should be noted. Oh, the tempurpedic beds are awesome!!!

Reviews.Title: “Room was superb”
Reviews.Author: ORRNFA
Reviews.Content: Room was superb, check-in and out was a breeze. Definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: “This place is fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: ThePrincessPa
Reviews.Content: We come to Ocean City once a year for vacation. This is the first time we stayed at The Princess Royale, and I must say we really liked it here! The room was nice and big, those tempurpedic beds...awesome! We asked for a room on an upper floor overlooking the pool and got EXACTLY what we asked for. It was never noisy and at night looked so nice. From the moment we walked in the staff did everything they could to make our vacation a happy one. I would not hesitate to recommend The Princess Royale to anyone. In fact, I already have!

Reviews.Title: “Great Value for Ocean City and on the beach”
Reviews.Author: mktguy
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here twice now and wouldn't hesitate to stay again. A little north of the boardwalk district, right on the ocean, well maintained.

Reviews.Title: “Hated to leave, can't wait to return - A Royale vacation!”
Reviews.Author: beach4shore
Reviews.Content: A wonderful resort for our young family, the Princess Royale provided us with a comforatble suite that totally accomodated our needs. Our daughter had her own space, complete with her own TV, and the well equipped kitchen gave us the option of eating in or out. The location is central to many attractions and restaurants, and the access to the beach was literally right outside our door. The staff, from check-in, to repairing a minor air conditioning issue, to cleaning daily, answering our questions at the desk, and especially the convenient and complimentary valet parking, were courteous, professional and friendly at all times. Having so many choices of activities available on site was wonderful! The enclosed pool was welcome on one of the chillier days, and the arcade area and game area near the pool was great! We hope that on our next visit we'll find time to take advantage of the spa facilities. We definitely plan to stay longer on our next trip. The best part about our vacation at the Princess Royale was being able to relax and enjoy our vacation as a family, and begin planning our return trip (and the valet parking was pretty awesome, too!) We hated to leave, but are already looking forward to returning - and bringing some friends along to experience a Royale vacation!

Reviews.Title: “Great resort--same ole same ole ocean city”
Reviews.Author: aldawizeguy
Reviews.Content: Princess Royale IS THE BEST RESORT ON THE STRIP " NO DOUBT". Rooms were clean, Pool was awesome, hot tubs always available, the only pain in the butt was the arcades for the kids running out of quarters, and broken down old games. Thier arcade should really be updated. The hotel service was awesome but if you get there to early, your going to wait til 4 o'clock to get your room. I recommend 2nd floor poolside rooms indoor. Those are the best. plenty of seating, you can sit and chat into the wee hours and no one bothers you. The only thing is the NON SMOKING THING -which is good but unfair. If you get locked out after smoking outside its a hike back to your room.. But the staff was great, great valet, the SCHOONERS RESTAURANT was a bit pricey and had a nasty staff, they need new people in there. and the food was terrible. The biggest problem with Ocean City MD is that its getting OLD! From the boardwalk to the monotony of stores. But if your just looking to relax --and goto the beach and have some indoor fun, PRINCESS ROYALE IS THE BEST VALUE IN OCEAN CITY. I'VE BEEN THERE TWICE-- AND THE ONLY REASON WHY I WENT WAS FOR PRINCESS ROYALE----GREAT VALUE--GREAT STAFF--ITS JUST THAT OCEAN CITY ITSELF NEEDS AN UPLIFT. I WILL NOT EVER GOTO OCEAN CITY AGAIN--BORING UNLESS YOU GO WITH FAMILY AND FRIENDS. WHEN YOU BEEN TO THE CARRIBEAN, AND THEN YOU GO LOCAL---ITS LIKE GOING IN REVERSE... AGAIN--PRINCESS ROYALE WAS AWESOME----BUT THE CITY--OCEAN CITY NEEDS A FACE LIFT....

Reviews.Title: “so GROSS!!!”
Reviews.Author: RMR3
Reviews.Content: I would never go back, it was just so GROSS. Pool view rooms face an indoor pool--that aside, it was like something out of the 70's with lots of smelly air freshner to cover up the old smell. Our bathrooom was disgusting, mildew growing in some of the tiles and a beyonded faded shower curtain. I showered with my flip-flops on. The beds were comfortable, the linens were dated and forget about the coach bed. I woud NEVER go back especially since when I was checking out there was a guest at the front desk complaining about having ants in her room. Here is the long and short of it, if you want a hotel that has not updated since the 70's, with smelly air freshner, slow elevators, and mildew; this is th right spot for you.

Reviews.Title: “MIXED FEELINGS”
Reviews.Author: pittpaeskimo
Reviews.Content: The 2BR condo we stayed in was perfect. Very roomy with a full kitchen, living room w/sectional couch, washer/dryer, two bathrooms, dining room, great view from the balcony! The biggest problem we had was with checking in....just bc it says check in after 4, doesn't necessarily mean AT 4.....we didnt get checked in until almost 5pm bc the cleaning people hadn't been to our room yet! After driving for 10 hours (LOTS of traffic!)....my husband was fit to be tied when we coudln't get into our room. When we spoke to the manager, she simply said, "its not ready yet, soon...." Not that we wanted anything for free, but...the manager was quite rude and non-accomidating. It's a hike to get to the condo's...you have to take one elevator to the second floor, then go all the way around to another elevator (which are veeeeeeery sloooooow) that takes you up to the 9th floor. The staff knows very little english! We did have a problem just about every day with our keycards. We exchanged cards every day we were there bc the cards would stop working. The last day, my father in law had security come up to look at the door, because it stopped locking all together! The security guy "reset" it and said it should take 5-10 minutes to be fixed. Well, after about an hour it was still not working. ANYONE could have come into our condo without a key! The indoor pool looked "merky". In the brocure pics, it looks so blue and clear......this was kind of a greenish color. We did have a nice vacation and nobody wanted to go home, BUT....the things I pointed out, I didnt think they should have been an issue. With a little better customer service and updates, I think this could really be a nice place. I STATED THAT I WOULD "NOT RECOMMEND" THIS HOTEL......ONLY BECAUSE THEY DIDNT HAVE A "MAYBE" CHOICE. THE CONDO WAS NICE AND FIT ALL 8 OF US, BUT...LIKE I SAID.....THERE WERE SOME THINGS THAT COULD HAVE MADE THE TRIP NICER.

Reviews.Title: “Clean Hotel but the Service Sucks!”
Reviews.Author: SolAble
Reviews.Content: I stayed here beginning on July 26, 2009. First, the maid service is awful. Each morning they knocked on our door at 8:00 am to see if we were still there, duh, we are on vacation and want to leave our room when we want to! Well, faithfully each morning we told the person that we would be out in about 1 hour. I am not sure they understood us since the room was never cleaned until several hours later, if at all. Two out of five days we stayed there, the room was never cleaned because they still didn't come until we were back from the beach at 4:00 pm. At that time, we wanted to get ready for the evening dinner, etc. Next, whenever we called the desk to we never got service - in fact one time they never gave us extra towels at all. Finally, the half price Mexican Dinner seemed like an interesting choice, so we stayed in the hotel for dinner. First, the waitress (Russian girl I guess) would not come to our table to refill drinks or get us anything except when we could catch her attention. She literally never made eye contact with us and was hard to find at all. Second, at the Mexican Dinner, chips and salsa were "bottomless" except we only got one small bowl for five people. When we caught the waitress, she said that they ran out of chips and salsa. How can you run out on Mexican Dinner night. In any event, the food was not great, the portions were small and the service sucked. I would not eat here again. The indoor pool while it was fairly large smelled of cloriine. We thought that it masked the urine smell from many children using the pool.

Reviews.Title: “Great”
Reviews.Author: Em1381
Reviews.Content: Our weekend stay was very enjoyable. We spent a very relaxing day at the beach and the indoor pool. Truley an awesome time. We ortdered room service for dinner and it was exceptional. Not only was the food delivered to our room in a timely manner, but they brought all the neccessities we needed to enjoy it- inclucing a whole ketchup bottle for our three year old.... who just loves ketchup. We are going back in September for another weekend family trip.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed but have issues”
Reviews.Author: Simons5
Reviews.Content: This was my second time staying at the Princess Royale, this time with family of 5. My family enjoyed the stay there, but I had some concerns. When booking the reservation I indicated that we had 5 individuals 2 adults 3 children. But when I to my room I only had itmes for 2 (i.e. towel, wash clothes, plates, forks, spoons) I had to get the service department to bring items. Eventhough they had the dishes stacked in the cabinets I have to rewash all items before serving my breakfast on them. Food was still stuck on the plates and the glasses still had dry milk on the bottom. And each day I was there I had to constantly ask housekeeping for additonal towel. Now our family one night took advantage of the many all you can eat buffets they have there. The seafood buffett spike our interest the most, but after getting there it was very disappointing. I could not leave since my son had already made a plate of only 13 food items they offered. Noe I have been to plenty of buffetts in the past with more than 13 items offered. I was very disappointed and upset that I paid $113.00 for nothing (19.95 per person plus drinks and gratuity). The next night i went to Bonfire which was a little more at (29.95 per person) but we left full and satisfied. Now tis hotel charged me 269.00 per night, when I went to the business center to use the computer to for directions I had to pay 3.00 per night for the internet. I have stayed at out hotels i.e. Holiday inn, Marriott, Hilton and have never paid for the internet before is this a hotel or kinkos. The gym was a little out dated with this being a hotel/ condo area I would think it would be a little better. The hotel need to make sure that the rooms are accomdating to the clients request ahead of time

Reviews.Title: “Princess Royale”
Reviews.Author: KingSteve
Reviews.Content: We found the hotel to be very accomadating. The rooms were clean and roomy, the amenities were good too, stove top, dishwasher and full refrigerator. Pool area was really nice, and easy access to the beach was nice too. If you are interested in spending a lot of time on the boardwalk however, this hotel is not very close and if you utilize the public busing, it can be a 15 minute ride to the board walk. Overall, we were pleased with our stay and I would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Queens for 3 days - a mother /daughter Getaway!”
Reviews.Author: Nonnie_9
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with the service and staff; I reserved by phone, and within 5 minutes I received my confirmation and pertinent information by email. On arrival we stopped at the desk to see about parking until 4:00 checkin, and the young lady at the desk said she would check - our room was ready! What a pleasant welcome for weary travelers! Also, checkout took all of 20 seconds - the young man at the desk had everything ready. The room was beautiful and roomy - the sleeping area was separate from the living area, and the kitchen had everything. The dishwasher and full sized refrigerator surprised me! The only "negative", - and I say it lightly as I smile remembering - was using a chair to get into that wonderful tempurepedic bed (slept like a baby..) - I have suggested a stepstool for the short and elderly folks like me! We liked the lobby - meeting up with friends for a short visit with them; Schooner's half price Mexican night, with excellent prices and services there as well. One of the nicest hotel stays I have experienced!

Reviews.Title: “We can't wait to go back next year.”
Reviews.Author: Lorrie914
Reviews.Content: The room was clean and spacious. The pool area was clean and beautiful. The short walk to the beach was awesome. We had a great trip.

Reviews.Title: “Accomidations met our every need...”
Reviews.Author: CS20
Reviews.Content: My wife and I went to Ocean City with our 14 yr old daughter and her best friend. The set up of the 2 bedroom / 2 bath condo turned out to be a wonderful venue for our trip. The girls had thier own bed room and bathroom so the timing for "getting ready" was never an issue. The living room / kitchen area was very spacious and never felt cramped even when our 21 yr old son came by with his friend. Best beach front accomidation in Ocean City.

Reviews.Title: “Plenty of room and a great view”
Reviews.Author: ashcarwv
Reviews.Content: We never laid eyes on the room that we booked. At check-in, my husband was told that we had been upgraded to a 2 bedroom condo. The kids each had their own bed in their room. The condo was roomy and comforable - had everything that we needed. We had a great oceanfront view. The Tempur-Pedic mattress was great. We had access to high speed internet. The staff were all friendly and curtious. Check-in and check-out were quick and easy. The only negative comment would be that it was a bit of a maze to get to the elevators and travel from the 5th floor to the main floor. Overall, we enjoyed the Princess Royale and will definately stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Summertime Fun”
Reviews.Author: Linco08
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with my stay at the Princess Royale. This hotel was much nicer than other hotels that I have stayed at in Ocean City. We stayed in a condo that was gorgeous as a result of its modern decor. Other than the bellhops and, the service was great. The hotel provided everything from fine dining to nighttime entertainment, which was very convenient.

Reviews.Title: “Princess Royale Oceanside was a great stay or our family”
Reviews.Author: pierogie1
Reviews.Content: We have been to Ocean city MD thre times now and this was our best stay yet. We enjoyed getting up ealy and walking out the hotel and directly on to the beach. There was alot to do and a variety of returaunts to choose from. My nine year old enjoyed the indoor pool and our trip to Jolly Rogers water Park.

Reviews.Title: “Will go back again!”
Reviews.Author: PAK126
Reviews.Content: This is our second consecutive year in OC and we have been there multiple times before in the past 13 years. We highly recommend this hotel to anyone who wants a beautiful hotel room, gorgeous condo complete with maid service, bellmen at your service night and day, free valet parking and perfectly situated self-parking garage, along with the best stretch of uncrowded beach on the strip! Like I said, we have stayed at many a high-rise condo and this hotel/condo combination takes the cake. The service was wonderful and we found everyone to be very pleasant. Yes, there can be a language barrier, but there is at any restaurant you go to too since there are a lot of foreign students working in OC in the summer. This hotel was clean, convenient, and one of the best we've ever stayed at!

Reviews.Title: “The best hotel we have stayed at in Ocean City!”
Reviews.Author: FleuryFan
Reviews.Content: We were pleasantly surprised by the new rooms, parking, view of the beach, and service. We would definitely stay at the Princess Royale again next year. It is a great place to go if you have kids, and also if you want a quiet getaway.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and relaxing”
Reviews.Author: Haligan
Reviews.Content: My wife and I along with our 3 year old, stayed at the Princess Royale for the weekend. We enjoyed our stay and found the hotel staff very accommodating. If I was to provide a tip, I would suggest staying above the 2nd floor. We had an oceanfront room however the palm trees obscured our view of the beach/ocean. Also, the noise from the restaurant was a bit disturbing but nothing we wouldn't deal with. I have found the price is very competitive as compared to the other nicer ocean front hotels in the area. My wife and I will most likely continue staying at the Princess.

Reviews.Title: “The perfect getaway”
Reviews.Author: brianpio
Reviews.Content: We only stay at The Princess Royale when visiting OCMD. We started there years ago and even though we've looked at other places we cant break away from what you get at The Princess. Its perfect for families or that couples getaway you want to take.

Reviews.Title: “Thank God for the Indoor Pool... the weather didn't cooperate.”
Reviews.Author: dgintowson
Reviews.Content: Nice place. With teenagers along, it was a blessing to have an indoor pool considering it rained nearly every day we were there.

Reviews.Title: “Faboulous”
Reviews.Author: thorsey
Reviews.Content: The staff is very plesant and always willing to help. Upon my arrival which was close to midnight the bellman and front desk clerk were very alert and willing to help my tired family settle in.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome”
Reviews.Author: sgatthebeach
Reviews.Content: We booked a two bedroom condo for our family and were pleasantly surprised with a generous upgrade to a 3 bedroom on the 8th floor with a jacuzzi in the master suite. The views were amazing! Our family could not have been happier or treated better. Every inch of the hotel was spotless. The entire staff from the front desk, housekeeping and security were all very friendly and accommodating. Diane Anderson, the condo manager, could not have been more helpful! From the moment she received our reservation in early spring, she provided top notch customer service and recommendations for our stay (which I do not see too often these days). Will's Beach Service in front of the hotel was fantastic. You could rent an umbrella and chairs for the entire week and they would have your space set up and ready for you no matter what time you came down to the beach. I would highly recommend utilizing their service. Compared to stays in other Ocean City Hotels and Condos (and there have been many), I can honestly say the Princess Royale was first class and far exceeded our expectations which are typically pretty high!

Reviews.Title: “It was eh-Won't stay there again”
Reviews.Author: HappeningChick
Reviews.Content: We stayed the weekend of July 24. We booked the trip through Expedia who does state in the very fine print that the hotel doesn't guarantee your room choice. And they mean it too!! When we got to the room instead of the 2 queen beds I had booked there was only one king and a very substandard sofa bed. When I went down to the desk they just reiterated that they don't guarantee the request. No effort whatsoever was made to check and see if there was any room with 2 queens available. Also, their seafood buffet was ok but the dessert table was wiped out and not replenished. Uninformed front desk employees and you will feel the language barrier in this hotel. They couldn't answer a simple question about their restaurant and when I had a question about the ac they didn't know what I was talking about. At these room rates, you can do better.

Reviews.Title: “Too Expensive for what you get”
Reviews.Author: divetravler
Reviews.Content: Check-in went fairly smooth. Parking is tough, seemed to be short a few spaces and difficult to navigate with a large vehicle. You must wait for a bell-boy if you need a luggage cart. Elevators were slow and stuffy. Hallways were not airconditioned. Rooms were pretty average and not what you would expect given the price. The beds were very comfortable. The indoor pool is saltwater, to each his own but I prefer freshwater pools. Family hotel with lots of children and reunions. Breakfast buffet was pretty good. About half of the staff were not very helpful or friendly. Front desk provided a key to my room to another person without identification. I was not pleased as this is a serious safety issue. Overall the hotel is decent. A good place for families as it is located in a quieter section of town. If the hotel were priced less I would not have expected as much from the room but then again everything in ocean city is expensive.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay!”
Reviews.Author: beachlover2026
Reviews.Content: I just returned from a weekend at the Princess Royale. The hotel was very clean and staff was friendly and attentive. We were allowed to check in around 1:00 pm even though the check in time is normally 4:00 pm. We requested several extra towels, blankets, etc. and each request was filled within ten minutes. They also were very generous with the parking passes. We were given two at check in and asked for two additional passes. The pool/atrium area was also very nice. Some of the hotel decor is a little dated but still in very good condition. You should definitely consider this hotel when staying in OCMD.

Reviews.Title: “The perfect vacation for true beach lovers!”
Reviews.Author: adamnamy
Reviews.Content: We chose this hotel because of the location (away from the boardwalk activity) and the indoor pool (just in case it rained). It is the absolute perfect place to stay. There were 4 adults and one 5 year old in our party. You would think that we would feel cramped in 1 room but it was a great size and we were all very comfortable! Check-in was quick and easy. Upon arrival, our room was fresh and clean with the most beautiful ocean view from our balcony! We used everything provided and everything worked without fail. There were alot of things to do within walking distance and some things were a short drive away. We enjoyed walking right out to the beach where we spent our entire days. In the evenings, we would walk to restaurants, mini-golf, shops, etc. The staff was helpful and friendly at all times and the housekeepers were exceptional! The evenings were so relaxing. We were able to open the doors to the balcony, after turning off the AC, and sleep while listening to the waves crashing on the beach and smelling that wonderful ocean air! We will always stay at the Princess Royale in the future and feel very fortunate to have found such a wonderful "home" at the beach!

Reviews.Title: “not a good very good trip”
Reviews.Author: hbighamjr
Reviews.Content: not a good experience, got there and there was stains on the bed sheets, took forever to get someone there to change them. staff either could not speak english or was in a bad mood. will not stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely loved it!!!”
Reviews.Author: ab714
Reviews.Content: Princess Royale is a TRUE GEM in OC, MD!! We are a super picky family, so we are also hesitant to stay at certain places. Loved the fact that this is a non-smoking hotel.. Traveled with 3 children ages 3-9, the kids didn't want to go home!! The hotel looks exactly as it does in advertisements. We had a 4th floor, Pool view room. Rooms were nicely appointed, queen sized beds were super comfy. Living room with sofa bed was also great. Kitchen/Bathroom were really nice. Everything was new and updated and well maintained! Off Street garage parking was also really convenient!

Reviews.Title: “Princess Royale really does give you the ROYAL treatment”
Reviews.Author: Naj355
Reviews.Content: My son's wedding was held at the Princess Royale on July 4th, 2009. My husband and I were in charge of the rehearsal dinner the night before the wedding. My son's wife to be wanted everything at the Princess Royale. I was very nervous, I did not really know anything about the hotel. When I called to make arrangements, I was told I had to talk to Maggie about the dinner. I was very pleasantly surprised when I began dealing with Maggie, I was not nervous after that. She could not have been anymore helpful. I had never done anything like this before, this was my only son. Maggie put my mind at ease. She sent me everything I needed. Also she e-mail me all the different meal plans for dinners such as this one. Anytime I had a question, she was right there with the answer for me. We could never have done this without her help and advice. She was so kind and friendly and went far beyond anything we expected. Then the night of the dinner arrived. It was beautiful! Maggie and her team could not have done a better job. We had so many great comments about the meal and the beautiful Cafe' on the Green location. I was so thrilled with the food and the service, I even asked Maggie and her team if I could help to clean-up. Needless to say they did not let me help, but everything was so wonderful I would have been glad to help them. I would totally recommend Maggie and her services to anyone planning a special event at the hotel. You never feel like you are alone in your planning, Maggie is always there to help with any problems or concerns you may have. All the other Princess Royale services were outstanding. Our room was beautiful with an awesome view of the ocean and the indoor pool. All the people that worked there were very nice. Checking in and out of the hotel was a treat, the clerks were so congenial. The food served in the hotel was fabulous. We really enjoyed the breakfast buffet. I took many of the wedding guest to enjoy it each day. Everyone really liked the food! We did not have to move our car after we parked it, everything we needed was right at the hotel. It would be a dream vacation for anyone that wants the ROYAL treatment. There commitment to excellence really makes you feel welcome.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Resort to meet all our needs”
Reviews.Author: pdedvukaj
Reviews.Content: We checked on July 5th, check-in was smooth,quick and the staff was very friendly. We traveled with our extended family and reserved four rooms. The rooms were very clean, well kept and I love the king size mattress, I have never slept on a more comfortable bed. Our family was pleased too, we had teenagers and some younger children, they loved the pool and the acarde games. I would stay here again and recommend this hotel to all of my friends, in fact one of my friends just book her room to stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Traveling w/ kids.”
Reviews.Author: oldbay1
Reviews.Content: I took my three children to the beach for a quick getaway. My husband was unable to join us. The rooms at the Princess Royale were very spacious. We packed our own breakfasts and lunches b/c every room has a full size refrigerator, sink, and dish washer. Two of my children could enjoy their breakfast while my youngest slept. After playing on the beach all day, I let them swim in the indoor pool to get a break from the sun. We were very comfortable at the Princess and we will return.

Reviews.Title: “Fun Time”
Reviews.Author: dedehanover
Reviews.Content: We had a very nice time and stay at the Princess. The room was very clean,but could have been bigger to accommadate storage. Acess to the beach was alittle confussing at first. The only complaint we had was when we stayed past check out we had trouble getting towels to clean up with before heading home, nobody seemed to know how to help and it was to confussing. The food was very good. The staff at check in were excellent and very helpfull. The view of the ocean from the lanai was great.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel - much better than expected”
Reviews.Author: kib57
Reviews.Content: We just spent 3 nights at the Princess Royale. The stay was very enjoyable and far exceeded our expectations. The room was clean and comfortable. (Only negative was my 16 year old said the mattress on the sofabed was terrible.) Free valet parking. Every time we called in advance, our car was ready by the time we got off the elevator. Every time we called for extra towels, pillow, etc., they were promptly delivered to our room. Furnishings, including flat screen tv, appeared to be fairly new. Free wi-fi access. Lots of restaurants nearby -- skip the hotel restaurant. Comedy club was only mildly amusing. Be warned that the hotel does not control the beach -- it's a public beach. There are chairs, towels and umbrellas for rent on the beach, but again, it has nothing to do with the hotel. The rental fees were reasonable. Beach was very clean and family oriented.

Reviews.Title: “Nice and clean place, well taken care of...”
Reviews.Author: travelalloveragain
Reviews.Content: Nice and clean place, well taken care of. Spent 5 nights here and all of the staff are as friendly as can be. The place is kind of a maze and walking from the parking garage gets old fast but once you get it figured out it's not too bad. Just a warning, make sure to get some kind of confirmation with all of the fine print on the coupons or no discount. Had inquired in February on the reservations and was told to just show the coupon for the early bird discount at check-in. We had a 2 room suite which qualified when booked but they said the origonal rate was already discounted? Some discount, it was higher than the posted rates? We did get into our room before the 4pm checkin so I guess that's the price you pay. The place was not full, maybe would have been better to just walk in with no reservation. Was on vacation and wasn't going to let that ruin the week. Other than those 2 gripes the place is pretty nice.

Reviews.Title: “Fun at the Beach!!!”
Reviews.Author: tankinibeach
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay ! Food and value for the dollar was excellent. Front desk managers could be a little more accommodating. We had a disagreement on price for the room. Front desk manager "DEVANNA" was friendly but let me know she wasn't going to help me out. She told me I had to write a letter to the board. That angered me, we have been staying here for years. (two times a summer)No special treatment for devoted, faithful returning vacationers. Not good in this economy. Next year we stay somewhere else....

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely beautiful hotel, super rooms, awesome pool”
Reviews.Author: welderson
Reviews.Content: Our room was beautiful and the mattresses were soooo comfy!! We were convienently right by the elevator and then steps to the pool and beach access. The staff was great, our only regret was not trying the hotels restaraunt, which we plan on doing the next time we stay at the Princess Royale!!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay oceanfront in Ocean City”
Reviews.Author: jeremiah090106
Reviews.Content: We really enjoy the Princess Royale. I like the location of the hotel, ability to do a short stay there, the comfy beds, cleanliness of the room, the efficiency kitchen, the balcony for views of the ocean, easy access to the beach, pool and hot tubs. We have enjoyed dinner there. I like being able to sit by the window and see the ocean, the food (crab cakes) are excellent and the wait staff friendly, fast and efficient. I would highly recommend this hotel. The only negative comment is that when we reported the need to fix the disposal and the closet door it wasn't taken care of during our stay. This didn't cause us any problems but it would have been nice for the staff to address it while we were there. Keep up the good work and thank you for a wonderful experience. We hope to return.

Reviews.Title: “Must stay Sure Thing”
Reviews.Author: wmbme380
Reviews.Content: Friendly, clean, comfortable, convenient,great beach!!

Reviews.Title: “A great relaxing get away”
Reviews.Author: vaduffers
Reviews.Content: Our trip to the Princess Royale was excellent. From the time we arrived at the hotel and were greeted by the staff until we checked out the service was excellent. The room was clean and met all our needs. The front desk was very helpful with directions and suggestions. We ate at Schooner's Restaurant and it was very good. We definitely would recommend the Princess Royale.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous Hotel”
Reviews.Author: gwen7760
Reviews.Content: This was our 4th trip to Ocean City and staying at the Princess Royale. We could not be happier with the hotel and the service. There was not an employee there who did not greet us or help us when we asked questions. My daughter will tell you the pool is fantastic. She is 8-years-old and spent 5 hours in one day alone swimming in that pool. The rooms were amazing and very neat and clean. We recommend this hotel to anyone going to Ocean City. You will not be disappointed! We will be back again next year!

Reviews.Title: “exceeded our expecations”
Reviews.Author: mickik
Reviews.Content: We took a quick trip to Ocean City with the kids to get a little beach time in. We don't normally go to Ocean City so I do not know the hotels at all there. The Princess Royale had good rates and had good reviews and was right on the beach. We stayed in a Suite overlooking the indoor pool on the 5th floor but had a view of the beach through the large glass wall in the pool area. I was concerned that it would be too noisy but the room was very quiet. When the balcony door was open you could hear the classical music that plays throughout the hotel which I felt gave a sense of calm and peace. The pool shut down at 10 pm so there was no noise at bed time. The room was much larger than expected so that I did not feel cramped at all. The beds were very comfortable and the bathroom was spacious, clean and had been recently updated. The kitchen area had a standard size refrigerator, stove, glassware, silverware, plates and to our astonishment a dishwasher. The room was decorated very tastefully. I really felt like I was on vacation as I felt very relaxed in this hotel. The outside of the hotel looks a little outdated but the inside I thought was great. I definately would stay here again and I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “The Princess Royale had everything we needed for a weekend at the beach!”
Reviews.Author: BGlass
Reviews.Content: The rooms were spacious and the added kitchen area made the trip a bit easier on the wallet. The restaurant/bar, Schooners, was fantastic. They had Happy Hour specials and the food was reasonably priced. The staff was very friendly. The rooms were clean and up to date. The beds were very comfortable. However, the pullout sofa bed was not comfortable....putting the mattress on the floor was a better option. --The parking garage was a little tight.

Reviews.Title: “Great experience!”
Reviews.Author: jpl3480
Reviews.Content: I stayed here a few times when I was a kid, about 15 years ago. I remembered having good experiences there, so we decided to stay here for a short 3 day trip to the beach. There were six of us, so we were pleasantly surprised when we arrived at our room to see they upgraded us to a condo room right on the ocean. They recently updated the kitchens, bathrooms, and furniture. The room was clean, the rates are very reasonable, and we were very pleased with the hotel overall.

Reviews.Title: “Princess Royal rocks!!!”
Reviews.Author: mario1101
Reviews.Content: Great price, great location, great staff. The only thing I would have hoped was that the rooms would have been cleaned a little better. Other than that (which i am sure was an isolated issue) I would stay their tomorrow!!!

Reviews.Title: “Beach LAX at the Princess Royale”
Reviews.Author: cking24301
Reviews.Content: Over-all a pleasant stay, though Hotel is somewhat difficult to navigate. Staff was pleasant, surroundings were clean, accommodations more than adequate

Reviews.Title: “A very nice place to stay - Princess Royale”
Reviews.Author: slee920
Reviews.Content: I traveled to OC for business 5 times in the month of May and stayed at the Princess Royale. The accommodations were wonderful, the staff - very pleasant. The hotel has been recently renovated and it is very warm and inviting. I also took advantage of the spa service and found that to be pleasurable as well. I would highly recommend the Princess Royale. Sharon M.

Reviews.Title: “Don't forget the little things ...”
Reviews.Author: dgintowson
Reviews.Content: Since the weather was awful during our week's stay, It would have been nice to have the Tiki bar open around the pool for the adults to enjoy while kids played in the pool. Also, at times, the lobby was not cleaned of cans, papers, trash. Overall, a great place to stay. Just remember the little things mean a lot to travelers.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Vacation”
Reviews.Author: beachb0und3
Reviews.Content: The Princess Royale had everything you could ask for. Even during rainy weather, we enjoyed swimming, fun and dining under one roof! Thank you for making our vacation fantastic and memorable!!!! We will be back!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Loved it !! Will be back.”
Reviews.Author: Smritijk
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this place with my husband and 5 year old son. We have tempurpedic mattress at home and I always have a tough time with bouncy hotel mattresses - so we loved the beds here and had a good rest after a long day. The little kitchenette is very very useful indeed. I just wish the appliances were more updated - the dishwasher was very loud and there wasnt any toaster. The separate living room area is a big plus. Excellent parking facility. On the whole, the stay was very comfortable and nice. We will most probably be staying at this hotel from now on.

Reviews.Title: “Multiple stays 1999-2006”
Reviews.Author: lamia321
Reviews.Content: My husband & I have stayed here over 4 times- going back to 1999 & are always pleased with the quality of service, the cleanliness of our room & the food service on the beach front. The last time we stayed here we had our 3 year old son with us & we took him for a swim in the indoor pool. Well long story short he went to the bathroom in it #1 & #2 & when I alerted the young lifeguard he did not close the pool to request cleaning, nor did he ask for us to get out of the water. Very odd & unsanitary. We were surprised & disappointed. Needless to say I cleaned up the mess that I could & we left the pool area. We also dined in the buffett which left alot to be desired as far as food selection. As a result fo the pool event, I am on the fence as to whether we'd ever go back.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: wrigly
Reviews.Content: The hotel was nice and clean, food was very good, atmosphere was really nice, view of the beach was great.

Reviews.Title: “A great staff”
Reviews.Author: BillyMelrose_MD
Reviews.Content: I was traveling on a motorcycle, there was a storm coming and the manager let me park my bike in the valet parking area which was under cover. I've been coming to O.C. all my life, for the past 25 years if I stayed in a hotel it was Holiday Inn on 67th st. Last Sept. I was there again traveling on my bike in the past they have always allowed me to park under there awning well this time some young manager would not allow it so my $54,000.00 show bike sat in the rain for 2 days and I will NEVER go back there. The manager and the staff at Princess Royale were great plus I like there ocean front rooms a lot better over all its just a better place to stay !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Will be coming back”
Reviews.Author: KSO624
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed with my fiancee at the Princess Royale for a long weekend at the end of May. The room was very nice for the price range. It had an excellent oceanfront view, and was very clean. The Temperpedic mattresses were amazing and the flat screen TV was a nice touch. The fridge and microwave were very convenient. We went to the Schooner's Restaurant for dinner one night, it was okay, but a little overpriced. Overall, I would definitely recommend the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place To Stay”
Reviews.Author: ldybug
Reviews.Content: We went to Ocean City for an athletic event and Princess Royale was the chosen place to stay for the team. What a great idea. Everything was clean, the staff was very friendly. Check-in was fast and easy. The rooms were very big. The hotel's pool and ocean was easily accessible. The pool was very big and not crowded and the beach area was just as nice. The restaurant offered good and affordable food of all kinds, which the kids liked. The hotel is also close to alot of stores that are within walking distance. If I went to Ocean City again and was loking for a place to stay, The Princess Royale would definately be at the top of the list.

Reviews.Title: “Royal Princesses at the Princess Royale”
Reviews.Author: Letsgonowandagain
Reviews.Content: Wonderful stay, all good except the towels... Scratchy.

Reviews.Title: “Smoking is Permitted...”
Reviews.Author: WashReport
Reviews.Content: I reserved this hotel because it said "non-smoking environment". However, guests and their guests are permitted to smoke on the balconies, outside of all entrances and immediately beyond the pool area. I was sick within the 12 hours and consequently did not enjoy the stay. When this reported, I was told that there was nothing that could be done, that smoking outside of the rooms is permitted in this manner. If second-hand smoke is an issue for you and your family, particularly your children, then don't stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Great But Where Are Things?”
Reviews.Author: apple21peace
Reviews.Content: my stay here was amazing by the pool and the arcade and the food and eveything was great. but when we tried to play ping pong we couldnt find the ping pong balls but everything else was amazing except the pool table when i put my money in there was no pool balls and when i wanted my money back it never gave me it back.but hen everything was great the food,the waterfall was so pretty when i walked it and it wasnt vacant like the other hotels and the beach a little to salty but the best place evey where gonna come back this summer for my daughters birthday so if there is any specials or coupons to stay please tell us!

Reviews.Title: “Princess Royal Oceanfront, Ocean City, Maryland”
Reviews.Author: sony420
Reviews.Content: Stayed on 4/24-4/26/09. The room upon entering smelled like cat urine. Only was to describe it but it wasnt really a cat im sure. Im guessing the room hadnt been used in quite a while and there was mold or something on the A/C unit. It was hot this weekend so we turned the air conditioning on...that did nothing. dispite calling down stairs, noone ever showed up to fix it. My biggest problem was that when I got home and was ready to pay my credit card online for the weekend..the had charged $50.00 more that the amount on my reservation confirmation. I called and they said this was incase " I wanted to make any calls or order room service, etc." Well I didnt and she assured me that it would be credited back, but it makes me wonder how often they do this that it goes unnoticed by the customer. Seems like a scam to me. Also if you own a truck dont go here. The parking garage cannot handle a large vehicle. it wont fit around corners. THIS IS NOT A JOKE. GARAGE SAYS NO TRUCKS..IM INCLUDING LARGE SUVS..EXPEDITIONS, ETC.

Reviews.Title: “Good Price, Good Amenities!”
Reviews.Author: teknoturtl
Reviews.Content: We stayed at a pool side room, which was nice because we could still see the ocean from our room. The room was very spacious, since it had a kitchen, living area, and a bed room. The bed was very comfortable. The atmosphere was great for kids, since there were lots of arcade games, foosball table, pool tables, and a pool full of kids to play with! On the downside, the pool/arcade area was quite loud, and the sound came into the room. Also, the pool was very crowded, it couldn't really be enjoyed by adults or quiet swimmers. I also wish the water had been warmer! The restaurant there was good for breakfast, and we all really enjoyed our stay there. We are planning to go back next year!

Reviews.Title: “Nice, Clean, but Not Luxury”
Reviews.Author: LeesburgJay
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at the Princess Royale on an off season weekend trip. We paid about $100 per night (oceanfront), which was a good deal. The rooms were clean, the beds were VERY comfortable, and the indoor pool was nice. Again, for $100, it was a good deal. I noticed that the rooms go for $250 + a night during the summer though, which in my opinion is WAY too expensive. The hotel is nothing remarkable, just average. Side Note: The hotel is away from Ocean City's main attractions, and on summer nights, the 1-2 mile distance can take 30-45 minutes. It's a haul!!!

Reviews.Title: “Rude Management!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: BeachBunnyMaryland
Reviews.Content: Drunken guests hurled objects from an upper balcony, damaging our automobile down below. Management was aware that the police were involved and did not give us a "heads up" that the police would be coming to our room at 2:00 in the morning, banging on our door, scaring our children out of their wits. Management was then rude and completely unaccommodating, offering NO apologies for the conduct of their drunken guests and the damage to our car. The only response was, "you shouldn't have parked underneath the balcony on the public street," and "it's not our fault that our guests were drunk!" VERY POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE. How about, "Sorry that we didn't give you a call to tell you that the police were on their way up to your room. Sorry that your car was damaged.
